keyMoments.title: Luffy vs Arlong Intensifies
keyMoments.description: Luffy battles Arlong, confidently declaring he has the strength to defeat him despite Arlong's claims of fish-man superiority.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering confidence and his philosophy of relying on his crew's strengths rather than trying to do everything alone.
keyMoments.quote: I have the strength to beat you, Arlong!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gomu Gomu no Tate
keyMoments.description: Luffy creates a defensive shield by stretching his fingers to block Arlong's tooth attacks.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Luffy's defensive rubber technique, showing his tactical growth and adaptation during combat.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gomu Gomu no Ami
keyMoments.description: Luffy entwines his fingers to create a net-like shape to trap Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's developing combat repertoire and creative use of his rubber powers.

keyMoments.title: Discovery of Nami's Cartography Room
keyMoments.description: Luffy is slammed into Nami's cartography room and discovers the maps she's been forced to draw for eight years, along with her blood-stained pen.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery reveals the true extent of Nami's suffering and strengthens Luffy's resolve to free her from Arlong.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares Nami as His Navigator
keyMoments.description: Standing in Nami's room, Luffy formally declares Nami as his navigator, cementing her role in the Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most important moments in establishing the Straw Hat crew, showing Luffy's unwavering commitment to his nakama.

abilities.description: Luffy grabs his fingers with his other hand and stretches them to create a shield that blocks blade attacks passing between the fingers.
Luffy entwines his fingers making a net-like shape and stretches them out to create a larger net to trap opponents.

relationships.description: Luffy declares Nami as his navigator, formally cementing her position in the Straw Hat crew despite her current situation with Arlong.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy discovers Nami's cartography room and the evidence of her suffering, then declares her as his navigator.

reveals.information: Can use Gomu Gomu no Tate (Rubber Shield) for defense
Can use Gomu Gomu no Ami (Rubber Net) to trap opponents

keyMoments.title: Teeth Regeneration Revealed
keyMoments.description: Arlong demonstrates his ability to infinitely regrow his teeth, with each new set being stronger than the previous one.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a key aspect of Arlong's fish-man biology that makes him such a formidable opponent.
keyMoments.quote: Each new set of teeth is stronger than the last!

keyMoments.title: Tooth Gum Technique
keyMoments.description: Arlong removes his massive teeth and uses them as handheld weapons like bear traps.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Arlong's signature Tooth Gum technique, showcasing his creative combat abilities.

keyMoments.title: Shark on Darts Technique
keyMoments.description: Arlong dives underwater and launches himself like a torpedo at Luffy, attempting to impale him with his sawshark nose.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Arlong's most dangerous close-range attack combining underwater abilities with physical attributes.

keyMoments.title: Berserker Rage State
keyMoments.description: Arlong enters an enraged state with wild eyes comparable to a berserk Sea King, becoming even more dangerous.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Arlong's true combat potential and significantly raises the stakes of the battle.

keyMoments.title: Kiribachi Weapon Revealed
keyMoments.description: Arlong retrieves his signature weapon, the Kiribachi, a massive saw-like sword with tooth-shaped blades.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Arlong's most powerful weapon, escalating the danger of the fight.

abilities.description: Arlong pulls out his own teeth and uses them as handheld weapons, immediately growing another set in his mouth.
Arlong shoots at his opponent like a torpedo with his unbreakable nose, intending to impale them. The speed increases when used in water.
As a sawshark fish-man, Arlong can regrow his teeth infinitely, with each new set being stronger than the previous one.

reveals.information: Can infinitely regenerate teeth with each set stronger than the last
Uses Tooth Gum technique with removed teeth as weapons
Uses Shark on Darts torpedo attack with his nose
Wields Kiribachi, a massive saw-like sword
